fplR
  • Reference
  • Articles

Get information on an FPL user

Gives a tibble containing summary info for a given user in the current FPL season.

userInfo(user_id)

Arguments

user_id

FPL user ID (retrieve from the corresponding user's https://fantasy.premierleague.com team page URL).

Examples

userInfo(user_id = 123)
#> $id
#> [1] 123
#> 
#> $player_first_name
#> [1] "Matt"
#> 
#> $player_last_name
#> [1] "Tong"
#> 
#> $player_region_id
#> [1] 241
#> 
#> $player_region_name
#> [1] "England"
#> 
#> $player_region_short_iso
#> [1] "EN"
#> 
#> $summary_overall_points
#> [1] 2157
#> 
#> $summary_overall_rank
#> [1] 122610
#> 
#> $summary_event_points
#> [1] 98
#> 
#> $summary_event_rank
#> [1] 91018
#> 
#> $joined_seconds
#> [1] 13079
#> 
#> $current_event
#> [1] 38
#> 
#> $total_transfers
#> [1] 55
#> 
#> $total_loans
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $total_loans_active
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $transfers_or_loans
#> [1] "transfers"
#> 
#> $deleted
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $email
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $joined_time
#> [1] "2016-07-19T09:21:56Z"
#> 
#> $name
#> [1] "No Fuchs Given"
#> 
#> $bank
#> [1] 20
#> 
#> $value
#> [1] 1012
#> 
#> $kit
#> [1] "{\"kit_shirt_type\":\"plain\",\"kit_shirt_base\":\"#211e1e\",\"kit_shirt_sleeves\":\"#faf5f5\",\"kit_shirt_secondary\":\"#e1e1e1\",\"kit_shirt_logo\":\"ea-sports-on-white\",\"kit_shorts\":\"#100f0f\",\"kit_socks_type\":\"hoops\",\"kit_socks_base\":\"#0b0b0b\",\"kit_socks_secondary\":\"#f9f0f0\"}"
#> 
#> $event_transfers
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $event_transfers_cost
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $extra_free_transfers
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $strategy
#> NULL
#> 
#> $favourite_team
#> [1] 11
#> 
#> $started_event
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $player
#> [1] 24882616
#>
